add_TF_interactNo descriptionCode

Methods code

add_TF_interactdescriptiontopprevnext
sub add_TF_interact {
my ($self,$qual,$quant,$scale,$desc)=@_;
unless (($quant)||($qual)) {warn 'Could not store undef interaction ' . $qual . $quant; return undef;}
unless (($qual)||($scale)) {warn 'Cannot store interaction unless I know the scale'; return undef;}
my $id=$self->table_insert('interaction',$qual,$quant,$scale,$desc);
$self->add_output('interaction',$id);
}
